---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

Import SAS data

```{r}
airline <- read_sas("http://www.principlesofeconometrics.com/sas/airline.sas7bdat",     NULL)
airline
```

Plotting the Results

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
ggplot(airline) +
 aes(x = Y, y = R, colour = YEAR) +
 geom_point(size = 1L) +
 scale_color_gradient() +
 theme_minimal()
```
